fun.connor.cafe.security

Interface SecurityRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MongoSecurityRepository

    public interface SecurityRepository
    DAO for auth resources. The top level object of this repository is the Subject.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createNewUser(Subject subject)
      Creates a new Subject in the repository.
      java.util.Optional<Subject> getSubjectById(java.lang.String id)
      Find a subject by it's Id string in the repository
      void updateSubject(Subject subject)
      Updates a subject in the repository.

    • Method Detail

      • createNewUser

        void createNewUser(Subject subject)
        Creates a new Subject in the repository. NoOp if the entry already exists
        Parameters:
        subject - the subject to store

      • updateSubject

        void updateSubject(Subject subject)
        Updates a subject in the repository. Creates a new subject if the entry does not exist
        Parameters:
        subject - the updated subject

      • getSubjectById

        java.util.Optional<Subject> getSubjectById(java.lang.String id)
        Find a subject by it's Id string in the repository
        Parameters:
        id - the subject Id
        Returns:
        A subject if one exists with the given ID or empty if no subject is found
